com.malikk.shield

Interface ShieldAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShieldAPIManager

    public interface ShieldAPI
    This is the interface for the main Shield API. It can be used to get all of Shield's Methods, aside from the methods within the Flag and ShieldRegion objects.

      • getShieldRegion

        ShieldRegion getShieldRegion(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String pluginName)
                             throws RegionNotFoundException
        Gets the ShieldRegion by the passed in name and plugin.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the desired region
        pluginName - the name of the plugin the region belongs to
        Returns:
        ShieldRegion - The highest priority ShieldRegion
        Throws:
        RegionNotFoundException

      • getRegions

        java.util.HashSet<ShieldRegion> getRegions(java.lang.String name)
                                           throws RegionNotFoundException
        Gets all the regions by the passed in name. This will only ever return more than one region if there are multiple regions with the same name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the desired region(s)
        Returns:
        HashSet<ShieldRegion>
        Throws:
        RegionNotFoundException

      • setFlag

        void setFlag(java.lang.String flag,
           ShieldRegion region,
           java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> players,
           boolean value)
             throws InvalidFlagException
        Sets a Custom flag for multiple Players
        Parameters:
        flag - flag name, String
        region - ShieldRegion
        players - HashSet that the value is applied to (can be empty)
        value - Boolean value that is applied
        Throws:
        InvalidFlagException

      • setFlag

        void setFlag(java.lang.String flag,
           ShieldRegion region,
           java.lang.String player,
           boolean value)
             throws InvalidFlagException
        Sets a Custom flag for a single Player
        Parameters:
        flag - flag name, String
        region - ShieldRegion
        player - String name, that the value is applied to
        value - Boolean value that is applied
        Throws:
        InvalidFlagException

      • getFlagValue

        boolean getFlagValue(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   java.lang.String flag,
                   ShieldRegion region)
                     throws FlagNotFoundException,
                            InvalidFlagException
        Checks the value of a flag for a specific Player.

        If the flag's Player list contains the player passed in, then this will return the flag's value. If not, it will return the opposite of the flags value.

        Parameters:
        player - player
        flag - flag name, String
        region - ShieldRegion
        Returns:
        Boolean
        Throws:
        FlagNotFoundException
        InvalidFlagException

      • getFlagValue

        boolean getFlagValue(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   Flag flag)
        Checks the value of a flag for a specific Player.

        If the flag's Player list contains the player passed in, then this will return the flag's value. If not, it will return the opposite of the flags value.

        Parameters:
        player - player
        flag - Flag object
        Returns:
        Boolean
